bug.author: alalek
bug.summary: OpenCL: some kernels are broken for CV_16F
bug.description:
Build example: <denchmark-link:http://pullrequest.opencv.org/buildbot/builders/master-lin64/builds/10608/steps/test_core-ippicv-opencl/logs/stdio>1</denchmark-link>
Message: <denchmark-code>[ RUN ] OCL_MatrixOperation/UMatExpr.Eye/28, where GetParam() = (CV_16F, Channels(1)) OpenCL program build log: core/set_identity Status -11: CL_BUILD_PROGRAM_FAILURE -D T=? -D T1=? -D cn=1 -D ST=? -D kercn=1 -D rowsPerWI=4 -D INTEL_DEVICE 2:11:1: error: expected parameter declarator </denchmark-code>
